# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I propose a special introductory offer of $10500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its market value but also my commitment to fostering long-term relationships with our esteemed clients. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
